Description.Name: Sales Rep
Description.Details: A purveyor of Quicsell products. Quirks: Merchant&Jinxed. Random Quicsell Light mech and gear

OptionDescription: When you lucked into a well paying sales job, you were ecstatic. You should have read the fine print. Turns out the Quicsell corperation wants you to do a live demonstration of some of their equipment.
Intro: With your contract already signed, you can't back out now, and the fine print has more teeth than you realized. Now you've got to act as a roving Sales Rep for the Quicsell corp, by way of using their products in a live mercenary company.
